reviewText: Present for my brother and he loved it!

I actually bought a copy to give to a friend who was a member of the 42th Rainbow Division. He is 96 years old and I am privileged to know and talk to him on a weekly basis. He was responsible for getting State Route 42 here in Ashland County, Ohio renamed and signs put up at the Ashland. Richland County line.
Interesting coverage of the 42nd Rainbow Division in WWI and WWII...my father served with the Rainbow in WWII
